author: The Canadian Press
title: Coronavirus: What's happening in Canada and around the world on Thursday
description: The federal government is expected to announce today new measures aimed at mobilizing the country's scientists and researchers in the fight against the COVID-19 pandemic. Here's a look at what's happening in Canada, the U.S. and around the world.
content:
The latest:
The federal government is expected to announce today new measures aimed at mobilizing the country's scientists and researchers in the fight against the COVID-19 pandemic.
